extendedInfo.description: The Uploader for Garmin can read data from your Garmin Forerunner, Edge, eTrex, Oregon, etc, store data in your phone, save to SD card, send activity via email, upload to Garmin Connect, Training Peaks, Endomondo, SportTracks, RunningAHEAD and Strava, export to GPX and share to Facebook. The app can also import FIT and TCX files from sdcard, flash drives, etc.At this time, these devices are supported:Forerunner 201 and 301Forerunner 305 and 205Forerunner 10, 110 and 210Forerunner 405, 405CX, 410 are in beta: http://goo.gl/XJKPjForerunner 310xt, 610, 910xt are in beta: http://goo.gl/ixrmQForerunner 50, 60, 70 are in alpha: http://goo.gl/DPDKHGarmin Swim is in alpha: http://goo.gl/DPDKHEdge 205 and 305Edge 500, 705 and 800eTrex 30, eTrex Legend HCx, ForeTrex 401 Oregon 550tGpsMap csx 60also reported working with Astro 200, Montana and the Garmin Fenix.For more details, see http://www.sportablet.com/answers.html. If you have troubles, take a look at http://www.sportablet.com/help.htmlNote: Edge 500/705/800 and Forerunner 110/210 may take a while to mount (up to 20 sec). Be patient, the app will start when they're recognized as USB devices by the tablet.The app supports Sony Xperia phones with built-in ANT+ chips, if you have one you don't need the Garmin ANT+ dongle.The Uploader is free to try: you can upload all activities, but explore only the most recent one. Once you know that it works fine with your Garmin device and Android phone/tablet, if you like what you see, you can activate it with an in-app purchase on Google Play (price is about 5 euros / 6.6 $).Note: in-app purchases are slow, and may take a couple of minutes to be confirmed. Don't panic :-).This is a simplified version of the Sportablet app, targeting mobile phones and small-screen tablets. If you have a 10" tablet, check out Sportablet on google play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.carlopescio.sportablet

reviews.comment: This is sweet, I just bought forerunner 305 with ant+ heart monitor for only $25\tThank you for this
reviews.author: Mike Biggs

reviews.title: Trial version not working properly
reviews.comment: Downloaded to try out with my Nexus 7 and Garmin 405. But keeps running into problems. Often needs 2 tries or more to get the session downloaded from the watch. And uploading the session anywhere is a big no no! All I get is a buy or die screen when clicking on the activity. All activities seem to be locked according to small icon picturing a pad lock. So does not quite work according to information on Google play.
reviews.author: Fredrik Lindstr\303\266m

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: It\'s so great to be able to upload activities from my ForeRunner610 to Garmin Connect without having to get to a computer. I can do it right from the finish line!
reviews.author: Andrew Rich

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Does what it\'s supposed to do!
reviews.author: Jonathan Stoops

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Worked perfectly first go with my Garmin 410 and Nexus 7 via the Ant+ dongle. So many choices for export too!
reviews.author: Mel McAlister

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Works fine now that I have an ant+ dongle that is > v1
reviews.author: Torkjell Skomedal

reviews.title: Works well with 910XT
reviews.comment: It does drop the connection on occasion but I have always been able to download my workouts after a couple of tries when this happens. I get an error email from Strava but the files are still uploaded.
reviews.author: Glenn Preston

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works well with galaxy s3 and s4 ,but for some reason does not always connect to my galaxy note 10.1, however this may be an issue with the usb otg on my note 10.1
reviews.author: mark stockley

reviews.title: Indispensable
reviews.comment: Fantastic app. Works flawlessly with my S3 and Note2, pairing with my forerunner 205. Allows me to extract the run and upload to sportstracks with ease, without a pc, and analyse runs before I\'ve even left the changing room! Would be great to be able to auto delete from the garmin, but not sure if this is even possibly with the API? Also now working great with my ANT forerunner 410. Direct upload to Sporttracks is an excellent addition.
reviews.author: Neil Catley

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: this App has made my PC redundant, Works every time with no problems,would be even better if you could edit your upload through the app instead of login into Garmin to edit but it\'s not a problem. :-)
reviews.author: Julian Megicks

reviews.title: Good app, does what you need. (310xt &nexus 7)
reviews.comment: Works well with my nexus 7 & 310xt. Still under construction - looking forward to some of the newer features. An auto-upload or batch upload feature would be useful.
reviews.author: Michael Lumb

reviews.comment: Great app, responsive developer
reviews.author: Kirk Roy

reviews.title: A very useful app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says on the tin. My only problem is that when my phone battery is low, importing from my Garmin often fails with USB errors. More descriptive error messages would be useful in this case.
reviews.author: Steve Block

reviews.title: Very, very useful
reviews.comment: With this app I can upload data from my Garmin with my nexus7 without needing a PC.
reviews.author: Mario Sangiorgio

reviews.title: Usually works well
reviews.comment: Sometimes I have to restart the app to make it transfer.   Would like to see some extra features such as seeing what activities were uploaded to an external source (Garmin) previously.
reviews.author: Phil Gunnewiek

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great app with full instructions to set up. Noob free!!
reviews.author: Faisal Siddiqui

reviews.title: Nice job!
reviews.comment: Works good with my xperia active / 310xt
reviews.author: Atis Verdenhofs

reviews.title: NOT FREE
reviews.comment: Scam application
reviews.author: Rob Turner

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: Lots of good updates from dev, works with my Sony Acro S (CM10) and FR910XT. Some workouts fail upload at first attempt but come through subsequently.
reviews.author: Ronald King

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: With the S4. Only big request is to enable multiple or auto uploads to Garmin connect etc.
reviews.author: Simon Gough
